DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness TGR-1202 combination obinutuzumab ( Gazyva ) chlorambucil patient chronic lymphocytic leukemia .
DOC.brief_title: TGR-1202 , PI3K Delta Inhibitor , Combination With Obinutuzumab Chlorambucil Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL )
DOC.criteria: Confirmed Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia ( CLL ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) score 0 2 Ability swallow oral medication Known hepatitis B virus , hepatitis C virus HIV infection Primary central nervous system lymphoma know intracranial involvement Autologous hematologic stem cell transplant within 3 month study entry Allogeneic hematologic stem cell transplant within 12 month
